QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Ragefire Chasm
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to Ragefire Chasm, just beneath the great city of Orgrimmar, immediately!$B$BThe Dark Shaman are poised to launch an attack at any moment and the city guards cannot hold for much longer! If you so choose, head to Ragefire Chasm and speak with Commander Bagran, head of the defense initiative, to end the threat to Orgrimmar once and for all.
